resources.string: No pictures in news when enabled.
Specify the number of the rank.
Specify the text size of contents.

• This app is designed for those who love American/British TV shows.
 这个软件是专为英美剧迷设计的

 • Users can get the realtime rankings of TV shows from ZiMuZu website.
 用户可以实时获得人人字幕组网站的剧集排名

 • The News tab provides various reviews of TV and movie.
 新闻界面提供了各种剧集电影的评论

 • As long as some TV shows are added to the Favorite,
 只要剧集被加入到收藏夹

 • further updates will be pushed automatically.
 更新将会自动推送

 • The remote download function requires users to set their Aria2 address and secret.
 远程下载功能需要用户设置个人Aria2地址和密钥

 • Do not forget add the port number and "/" at the end of your address.
 地址最后不要忘记添加端口号和正斜杠"/"
